plot: The Earth is facing a huge problem, over population. A second planet has to be sought out for the citizens of Earth. Therefore, an expedition fleet is sent out to find a suitable planet. ...
plot_en: The Earth is facing a huge problem, over population. A second planet has to be sought out for the citizens of Earth. Therefore, an expedition fleet is sent out to find a suitable planet. ...

title: Kikô Kantai dairugger XV
